name: Amity Tower
description:
Amity Tower is a hacking simulator horror game, but it isn't your typical horror game. You are not the one in danger. Use your lite haxor skillz to help Steve climb Amity Tower and retrieve his redemption from the fifth floor while trying not to get him killed.

Includes 2 endings, an unlockable final challenge, and memes.

Use F11 or ALT + ENTER to toggle fullscreen. ESC to exit to main menu (closes game when in main menu).
